patterns: Tell me about your health tech
Can you explain your wearable tech?
responses: Sensi-Seizure is our life-saving health tech, integrating wearables to detect seizures and trigger emergency alerts. It's designed to enhance safety and proactive care.
Our Sensi-Seizure wearable tech monitors for seizures and sends real-time alerts for rapid response. Interested in healthcare innovation? Visit www.aiglobalnetworks.co.za.
